reviewText: Very interesting for a person who has recently changed diet to vegan.  It is easier to say no to some foods knowing the benefits of good nutrition.

Love him. I love all the reseach he does and share with us. Everything is Scientificly (?spelling) backed up....it not his opinion....its facts. Im thinking of buying his 10 dvd series for a Christmas present to myself.
I love every thing Dr. Greger presents: It is clear and thorough with a nice touch of humor and encouragement.
I found this to be very interesting and informative.  It's easy to comprenend and it will hold your attention.  I recommend it.

I have a complete set of these dvds and watch them repeatedly.  Each volume gives me new insight and information.  Dr. Greger is funny, intelligent and informative.  I don't always like what he has to say, but he is always right.
